document_data.name: Green Sirene
document_data.mainbody: The '''Green Sirene''' was an inn in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Location: The Green Sirene lay on Whistleturn War, close to the Market in the center of the city.
document_data.Description: It was a good-quality establishment with moderate prices and favored by sailors.
document_data.History: During the [[Time of Troubles]] of the [[1358 DR|Year of Shadows, 1358 DR]], the Green Sirene was commandeered by the Tantran navy. They used it as a barracks and a recruiting post.
